ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Questions??????
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, yes as mentioned a few times begging is useless.  You have pretty much wasted that time working on your begging skill.  Why do you have direction sense?
ygData.messageBody:
Hello, yes as mentioned a few times begging is useless. You have pretty
much wasted that time working on your begging skill. Why do you have
direction sense? Norrath is a huge world..you will soon answer your own
question on that. And safe fall, just keep doing what you are doing to
build it up, practice Mend with Safe Fall whenever you take too much damage.
Remember you can only use Mend every 6 minutes. I suggest working on that
skill the most..if your skill in Mend is 5 then it will only work 5% of the
time. Plus a couple things to remember as a monk do not carry more than
14lbs..do it and your AC will suffer. Balence your weapon skills meaning
use a 1hb in one hand and a hand to hand weapon in the other hand or
whatever. Once you get Feign Death practice that skill as much as you can,
it will save your life many times. And also not all the characters are
white, Eurdites are of course black and the dark elves, trolls, vah shir,
and froglocks are their own colors/races. Well that is it Happy Hunting.

Bloodbrood Deathdisciple <Ceatlitus>
Shadowknight of the 30th Season

-----Original Message-----
From: Robert [mailto:Rengar65@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 22, 2004 3:16 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Questions??????


Ok, I'm new to this group and to playing EQ.

My questions may be redundant to those asked by others here or even
off the wall but her goes.

Does any one use begging?

I have built mine to 23 (not real hi I know but the character is only
9th level) so far all it has done is get me 2 copper and attacked
twice. Not good odds (one attack per copper).

Why do I have direction sense? And why would you buy a compass?

I have a compass on my screen. I already know what direction I am
facing. My direction sense is at 200 and it still only works about
60% of the time.

As a monk, how do I improve my safe fall skill without spending all
my points on it?

I keep jumping off tall things and taking damage but no improvement.


Why are all the characters white? What if I want to play a black
person?

Well that's about it for now. I look foreword (because my eyes are
in the front of my head :P ) to your answers.

Robert
